description: Numbers whose set of base 6 digits is {0,1}.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1023
formula: a(n) = Sum{d(i)*6^i: i=0, 1, ..., m}, where Sum{d(i)*2^i: i=0, 1, ..., m} is the base 2 representation of n.a(n) = A097252(n)/5.a(2n) = 6*a(n), a(2n+1) = a(2n)+1.a(n) = Sum_k>=0 {A030308(n,k)*6^k}. - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Oct 20 2011
mathematica: t = Table[FromDigits[RealDigits[n, 2], 6], {n, 0, 100}](* _Clark Kimberling_, Aug 02 2012 *)FromDigits[#,6]&/@Tuples[{0,1},6] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 31 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
